articles.title: WC flooding: Residents of Village One informal settlement seeking safety
articles.author: Primedia
articles.summary: Village One informal settlement in Lwandle, near Strand is overcrowded and flooded due to heavy rain in the past two days. Community leader Thulani Nonyathi says the conditions are not healthy for children, especially because the canal is not cleaned.
